title: i9500 stock rom
description:
After immense frustration with hotfile.com I finally managed to DL the stock i9500 rom. 

This is the UAE version (I9500XXUBMG9_I9500OJVBMG9_XSG) but should work with most i9500 phones, it is in English.

I used it to restore my i9500 to stock after I soft bricked it, I followed this guide: http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=2265477 

Goodluck if you try to download the stock rom off hotfile.com, because they suck donkey cock. ads flying up everywhere, restrictions per hour, oh and that is if your DL doesnt bomb out halfway.
 
I will seed this for a long time, please just note the speeds may be a little slow as Im posting this from shit hole South-Africa.

PS - Fuck you hotfile.com
